title: Canadian Rockies Golf Unveils 'Playin and Savin' Package'
text:
(CANMORE, Alberta, Canada) – Canadian Rockies Golf – a group of superlative courses and resorts located in central Alberta – adds a new experience to its signature packages, allowing U.S. residents a prime opportunity to cash in on the most favorable exchange rate in years.
“With the U.S. dollar netting more than 20 percent on the Canadian dollar, our American friends can enjoy huge savings during the best time of the year to golf and experience other seasonal activities,” said Steven Young, director of golf at The Fairmont Banff Springs Golf Course. “Our courses are in wonderful condition and the weather is prime for absorbing all the area has to offer on and off course.”
Starting at $1,009 (USD) and offering a savings of as much as $450 per person, the “Playin’ & Savin’ in the Canadian Rockies” package (http://www.canadianrockiesgolf.ca/playin-savin-canadian-rockies/) features tee times at a choice of The Fairmont Banff Springs, The Fairmont Jasper Park Lodge, Canmore Golf & Curling Club, Stewart Creek Golf & Country Club and Silvertip Resort. Accommodations may be selected from The Fairmont Banff Springs, Rimrock Resort Hotel or Blackstone Mountain Lodge.
The package also includes unique after-golf activities such as a Banff Gondola Ride, Banff Lake Cruise, Glacier Adventure or Glacier Skywalk.
Known for its inspiring beauty and pristine, unspoiled natural setting, the highly acclaimed Canadian Rockies Golf courses are regular fixtures in “best of” rankings by SCOREGolf, Golfweek and other leading North American media outlets.
For a full list of stay-and-play packages, instant Quote: s, golf course capsules, imagery and testimonials, visit www.canadianrockiesgolf.ca or call 1.855.835.8484.
About Canadian Rockies Golf
Canadian Rockies Golf represents a collection of six award-winning golf properties located in the stunning landscape of the Western Alberta province: Canmore Golf & Curling Club, The Fairmont Banff Springs, The Fairmont Jasper Park Lodge, Kananaskis Country Golf Courses, Stewart Creek Golf & Country Club and Silvertip Resort. Known for dramatic, historic and untamed layouts, each course provides a unique mountain-golf experience where wildlife is regularly seen and unforgettable views are found. This is golf that inspires.
For more information call 1.855.835.8484, visit www.canadianrockies.net or "Like" the Canadian Rockies Golf Facebook Page at www.facebook.com/canadianrockiesgolf.
